val:
1. Resolve complex technical problems for internal and external end users
  2. Onsite point of contact for Salesforce.com (Service Cloud) for the Application Support team
  3. Maintained Salesforce.com standard and custom objects, while also configuring page layouts, workflows, email templates, and data fields
  4. Made UI edits to customize various Salesforce community portals
  5. Managed a Sandbox environment and acted as a liaison for a Salesforce consulting firm
  6. Perform application testing and identify and resolve/triage potential product defects and performance abnormalities
  7. Engage in QA process, pre- and post- implementation planning sessions regarding our applications
  8. Collaborate with Product, UX, and Development teams to facilitate processes throughout the release management cycle
  9. Coordinate and ensure completion of ad hoc projects to increase efficiency within the Product Operations department
  10. Create, track progress, and manage change and incident management tickets to resolution and articulate business impact for concurrent and subsequent analysis
